text: <@U05KNCMAE7N> is it something you or your team can help with? :blush:

Need some layout help, I have these two buttons in a table cell, but I can not figure out how to move these buttons to the top of the cell. I tried wrapping them in a flex, but the flex does not expand to take up the entire cell. Any help here would be appreciated!
<@U05ENUJF7B5> is it possible to trigger a CRM property update from a button? or use it as a workflow trigger? I'm trying to figure out how to pass content from the card into a property or a record.
